SEC charges Carl Icahn with hiding billions in loans backed by IEP stock

item.title: Who is Mike Lynch, the British tech entrepreneur missing after sinking of superyacht?
item.description: Dubbed ‚ÄúBritain‚Äôs Bill Gates,‚Äù Mike Lynch sold his data company for $11 billion in a controversial deal. Lynch is among several people missing after a superyacht, Bayesian, sank early Monday morning in a powerful storm off the coast of Sicily.

item.title: Fed survey shows lows in employment, worries about finding work and dissatisfaction with pay
item.description: The survey showed a slide in people reporting they are employed, a surge in those looking for work and growing dissatisfaction with pay.

item.title: Trump Media‚Äôs stock on pace for lowest close in seven months
item.description: Shares of Trump Media & Technology Group Corp. are down 2.7% Monday and trading around $22.43, putting the stock on pace for its lowest close since Jan. 16, when it closed at $22.35, Dow Jones Market data show.

item.title: Nvidia earnings ‚Äî not Powell's speech ‚Äî will be the big catalyst to end summer, Bank of America says
item.description: Stocks were up on Monday but may be getting a bit ahead of themselves before Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell's speech.

item.description: Day one of the DNC will showcase Joe Biden's legacy, with speeches by the president, first lady Jill Biden and former Secretary of State Hillary Clinton.

item.title: Four REIT stocks pass a strict quality screen, with dividend yields up to 6.19%
item.description: Income-seeking investors will soon lose their easy access to yields of over 5% in bank accounts.

item.title: Goldman says buy Nvidia with conviction, earnings to top Street next week
item.description: Goldman Sachs is staying bullish on Nvidia ahead of the chipmaker's second-quarter earnings report next week.

item.title: British tech entrepreneur Mike Lynch reported missing after superyacht sinks off Sicily
item.description: British tech entrepreneur Mike Lynch is missing after the sinking of a superyacht off the coast of Sicily, sources familiar with the matter told CNBC.
